Strings.Text: {scroll 2}Something is written on\nthe wall.{clear 0}Water=1, Red=2,\nPurple=3, Green=4{scroll 2}

{scroll 2}Will you put water in the
empty bottle?{branch 0 1 1}{scroll 2}There's a UMB.No2.{clear 0}Will you put UMB No.2 in the
empty bottle?{branch 0 1 1}{scroll 2}There's a UMB.No4.{clear 0}Will you put UMB No.4 in the
empty bottle?{branch 0 1 1}{scroll 2}There's UMB No.2. You need
a container to obtain it.{scroll 2}

{scroll 2}There's a UMB.No2.{clear 0}Will you put UMB No.2 in the
empty bottle?{branch 0 1 1}{scroll 2}There's a UMB.No4.{clear 0}Will you put UMB No.4 in the
empty bottle?{branch 0 1 1}{scroll 2}There's UMB No.2. You need
a container to obtain it.{scroll 2}
{scroll 2}There's a UMB.No4.{clear 0}Will you put UMB No.4 in the\nempty bottle?{branch 0 1 1}{scroll 2}There's UMB No.2. You need\na container to obtain it.{scroll 2}
{scroll 2}There's UMB No.2. You need\na container to obtain it.{scroll 2}
{scroll 2}There's UMB No.4. You need\na container to obtain it.{scroll 2}
\nIt's poison gas!{scroll 2}Perhaps I should leave for\na moment.{scroll 2}
Do you want me to heal\nyour wounds?{scroll 1}{branch 0 1 0}{scroll 0}\n{scroll 2}{timed 130}
{scroll 2}There's UMB No.2. But he\ncan't handle chemicals.{scroll 2}
{scroll 2}There's UMB No.4. But he\ncan't handle chemicals.{scroll 2}
